statements: SELECT amount, currency FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT transaction_id, source_wallet, destination_wallet, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT amount, status FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT transaction_date, amount, currency FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, source_wallet, destination_wallet, status FROM transactions WHERE currency = 'USD' AND (status = 'pending' OR status = 'processing') ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT destination_wallet, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY destination_wallet HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT source_wallet, destination_wallet, currency, status FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY currency ASC, transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE currency = 'USD' AND payment_gateway = 'PayPal';
SELECT audit_action, audit_details FROM payment_audit_logs WHERE log_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND currency = 'USD';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-02-28';

SELECT payment_transactions.transaction_id, payment_transactions.amount, payment_transactions.currency, payment_audit_logs.audit_action FROM payment_transactions INNER JOIN payment_audit_logs ON payment_transactions.transaction_id = payment_audit_logs.transaction_id WHERE audit_date >= '2022-03-01' AND audit_date <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM payment_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING transaction_count > 5 ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT id, amount, currency FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 10
SELECT * FROM gateways WHERE country = 'USA' AND active = TRUE
SELECT gateway_id, gateway_name FROM gateways
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE currency = 'USD';
SELECT amount, currency FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND username <> 'admin';
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email, address FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallets WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT wallet_id, user_id, balance, currency_id FROM wallets WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;

SELECT u.username, w.balance, c.currency_code FROM users u INNER JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id INNER JOIN currencies c ON w.currency_id = c.currency_id WHERE u.address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY u.username ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.amount, c.currency_name FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN currencies c ON t.currency = c.currency_code WHERE t.amount < 500 ORDER BY t.timestamp ASC;
SELECT u.username, SUM(w.balance) AS total_balance FROM users u LEFT JOIN wallets w ON u.user_id = w.user_id GROUP BY u.username HAVING total_balance > 10000;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transaction_records WHERE currency='USD';
SELECT username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT gateway_name, currency_supported FROM payment_gateways WHERE currency_supported='EUR';
SELECT log_id, date, action_taken, description FROM audit_logs WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_records WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transaction_records WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, balance FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'J%' OR balance < 0 ORDER BY balance DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, g.gateway_name, t.transaction_status, t.completion_date FROM gateway_transactions AS t JOIN payment_gateways AS g ON t.gateway_id = g.gateway_id WHERE t.transaction_status = 'SUCCESS';
